subject: Art & Design
title: Juxtaposition: Unexpected Combinations
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Juxtaposition: Unexpected Combinations.

hook.text: A homeless man sleeping beneath a luxury billboard. The contrast between the two subjects tells the story.

buildup.text: Juxtaposition places contrasting elements side by side: old/new, big/small, rich/poor, nature/industry.

discovery.text: The power is in the gap between the two elements. The viewer's mind bridges that gap with meaning.

twist.text: You don't create the contrast ‚Äî you find it. The best juxtapositions exist naturally; the photographer reveals them.

climax.text: Social documentary photography relies on juxtaposition: showing the world's contradictions in a single frame.

punchline.text: Two unrelated subjects. One frame. Infinite meaning.

quiz.question: What makes juxtaposition powerful in photography?
options: The contrast between elements creates meaning the viewer interprets
Cameras focus better on two objects
It's a required rule in all photography competitions
